entry.title: Build dynamically scaled highly available python application with MySQL
entry.summary:
Description

MySQL High Availability clusters allow you to develop any application that can scale to accommodate for any load your application need to serve. We will explore the new InnoDB Cluster, understand how it works and how to build it. Next we will talk about MySQL NDB Cluster and how it's different to InnoDB Cluster. Finally, we will do a live demo of both to show in real life how you can use them both with your Python application.

With more then 25 years in the IT industry, with strong focus on open source solutions, for the last 9 years acting as a MySQL technical consultant for many APAC companies and organisations. Based in Melbourne and serves ANZ as a core territory. Have a great passion to talk, learn and share knowledge. Overall nice person, given the morning coffee was reasonable.

entry.summary:
